page.title: 05INDUSTRY-BUSINESS.Headcorn.
page.content: There are no large factories in this area of HEADCORN,but a few small firms are situated near the main{A274}road,a portion of which enters the extreme South-West corner of this block,on the Eastern side of{HEADCORN}village,Kent. A long established company of{Builders {and Decorators(A.T.PALMER)}have their premises here with Offices,Stores and a small workshop on site. They under- take all kinds of Building work and Electrical repairs,but specialise in the extensive restoration of Period Houses. On the corner of{Oak Lane} and{Grig Lane}a short distance away, supplies of{Animal Feed}and{Fertaliser products are kept in two large storage barns adjoining the home of a family of{Corn Merchants (C.FOREMAN and Son)} who have larger premises situated elsewhere in{HEADCORN VILLAGE.}
